attributes.name: CompromisedAccountOTAccess
attributes.query: (index:it_auth AND (rule:TokenReuseRule OR rule:VelocityRule)) AND (index:ot_logins AND off_hours:true) AND timestamp >= now()-1h

attributes.name: UnusualEngineeringActivity
attributes.query: index:ot_hmi_logins AND role:engineering AND (index:email_events AND type:AuthVerificationRequested AND verif_count:>50)

attributes.name: ZonalBoundaryBreach
attributes.query: index:fw_logs AND action:allowed AND NOT allowed_pair:true AND (index:ot_network AND protocol:*)
